# Retrieve an Exchange Session

This section shows you how to retrieve an exchange session resource.

### HTTP request

> `GET https://api.dwolla.com/exchange-sessions/{id}`

### Request parameters

| Parameter | Required | Type   | Description                                  |
| --------- | -------- | ------ | -------------------------------------------- |
| id        | yes      | string | Exchange Session resource unique identifier. |

### HTTP status and error codes

| HTTP Status | Code     | Description                                                      |
| ----------- | -------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 200         | Ok       | The Dwolla API accepted the request and returned a response.     |
| 404         | NotFound | The requested resource was not found. Check Exchange Session ID. |

### Request and response

```bash
GET https://api.dwolla.com/exchange-sessions/fcd15e5f-8d13-4570-a9b7-7fb49e55941d
Accept: application/vnd.dwolla.v1.hal+json
Authorization: Bearer pBA9fVDBEyYZCEsLf/wKehyh1RTpzjUj5KzIRfDi0wKTii7DqY

...

{
    "created": "2024-03-25T17:13:38.430Z",
    "_links": {
        "self": {
            "href": "https://api.dwolla.com/exchange-sessions/9b7fb629-0fad-44f4-8c5e-44c25a0bfa8e",
            "type": "application/vnd.dwolla.v1.hal+json",
            "resource-type": "exchange-sessions"
        },
        "exchange-partner": {
            "href": "https://api.dwolla.com/exchange-partners/bca8d065-49a5-475b-a6b4-509bc8504d22",
            "type": "application/vnd.dwolla.v1.hal+json",
            "resource-type": "exchange-partner"
        },
        "external-provider-session": {
            "href": "https://int-widgets.moneydesktop.%3D",
            "type": "application/vnd.dwolla.v1.hal+json",
            "resource-type": "text/html"
        }
    }
}
```

```ruby
# Using dwolla_v2 - https://github.com/Dwolla/dwolla-v2-ruby
exchange_session_url = 'https://api.dwolla.com/exchange-sessions/e5e9f2d3-a96c-4abd-a097-8ec7ae28aa8a'

exchange_session = app_token.get exchange_session_url
exchange_session['_links']['external-provider-session']['href'] # => "https://int-widgets.moneydesktop.%3D"
```

```php
/**
 * No example for this language yet.
 **/
```

```python
# Using dwollav2 - https://github.com/Dwolla/dwolla-v2-python
exchange_session_url = 'https://api.dwolla.com/exchange-sessions/e5e9f2d3-a96c-4abd-a097-8ec7ae28aa8a'

exchange_session = app_token.get(exchange_session_url)
exchange_session.body['_links']['external-provider-session']['href'] # => 'https://int-widgets.moneydesktop.%3D'
```

```javascript
// Using dwolla-v2 - https://github.com/Dwolla/dwolla-v2-node
var exchangeSessionUrl =
  "https://api.dwolla.com/exchange-sessions/e5e9f2d3-a96c-4abd-a097-8ec7ae28aa8a";

dwolla
  .get(exchangeSessionUrl)
  .then((res) => res.body._links["external-provider-session"].href); // => "https://int-widgets.moneydesktop.%3D"
```
